```{r, include=FALSE,echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(png)
# Load packages 

```



```{r, results='asis',fig.align='center'}
Venndiagram  <- readPNG(params$VENN)
Venndiagram <- grid.raster(Venndiagram)
cat(" \n\n Venn diagram of Transdecoder-predicted complete ORFs with predicted signal peptide. Sequences with at least one domain in common with a ToxProt annoated protein in red(TD). Sequences with BLAST match of bitscore of at least 250 to a ToxProt annotated protein in green(TP). Sequences with Kallisto-predicted expression of at least 1 % of Total expression in yellow(KE). Sequence with at least 50% sequence coverage by mass spectrometry in blue (MS), where available  \n\n ") 

```


### Table of Transdecoder-predicted complete ORFs with predicted signal peptide from venn diagram above
```{r , echo=FALSE}
Uniontable <- read.csv(params$TABLE)
datatable(
  Uniontable,
  options = list(
    lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20),
    dom = 'Blfrtip',
    buttons = list(
      'copy',
      'csv',
      list(extend = 'colvis', text = 'Column Visibility')
    )
  ),
  extensions = 'Buttons'
)


```
